panel.name: overlay_bar

button.name: IM Received
button.label: IM received
button.tool_tip: You have instant messages pending (the number of sessions which received new IMs is shown between parenthesis and when a star follows that number, it means there is a private IM/conference session among them). Click to show IMs.

button.name: Set Not Busy
button.label: Set not busy
button.tool_tip: Chat and IM is hidden for you. Click here to set yourself not busy.

panel.string: Chat and IMs are hidden in the console and the persons IMing you receive a busy response message. Click here to set yourself not busy.
IMs are hidden in the console and the persons IMing you receive an auto-reply message. Click here to disable the auto-reply mode.

button.name: Flycam
button.label: Flycam
button.tool_tip: Your camera is under joystick control, click here to release it.

button.name: Mouselook
button.label: Mouselook
button.tool_tip: Use mouse to steer your view. If you have a gun, clicking will shoot.

button.name: Public Baking
button.label: Public baking
button.tool_tip: Your avatar's baked textures and appearance are only being updated locally. Click to resume public baking.

button.name: Rebake Region
button.label: Rebake region
button.tool_tip: Click here to rebake the navmesh of the region.
